column4: ma wo ndze do dɛ akasamu
column5: na ka me man hɔn mbrato kyerɛ hɔn
column6: na ka Jakob fifo hɔn bɔn kyerɛ hɔn."

column3: na wɔpɛ dɛ wohu m'akwan: dɛ gyama ɔman bi a wɔyɛɛ ndzeyɛtsenenee
column4: na wɔanndan hɔn Nyankopɔn nhyehyɛɛ enngya

column3: na ɔwo innhu? Yeehiahia hɛn kra ho
column4: na ɔwo mmfa nnyɛ hwee yi? Hwɛ

column3: mansotwe na etutuwpɛ ntsi na hom dzi mbuada
column4: na hom awowɔ emumuyɛ ekutuku: nnyɛ hom ndɛ mbuadadzi yi na ɔbɛma wɔaatse hom ndze wɔ sor."

column2: "Aso iyi nye mbuada a masan mu meyi no? Aso da a nyimpa hiahia ne kra ho nye yi? Aso ɔno nye dɛ ɔbɔbɔ ne tsir adze dɛ mbɛw
column3: na ɔdze eyitam na nso asɛw n'ananadze? Aso ebɛfrɛ iyi dɛ mbuadadzi
column4: na da a ɔsɔ EWURADZE enyi?"

column2: "Ana nnyɛ iyi nye mbuadadzi a masan mu meyi? Dɛ hom bɛsansan emumuyɛ apɔw no
column4: na wɔama hɔn a wɔatseetsee hɔn no wɔaafa hɔnho edzi akɔ
column5: na hom eebubu kɔndua nyina mu?"

column2: "Ana nnyɛ ɔno nye dɛ ibubu w'edziban ma nyia ɔkɔm dze no
column3: na dɛ edze abɔbɔfo a woeyi hɔn tokyen no ba wo fie? Sɛ ihu ɔdagyanyi a
column4: ekata no ho; na dɛ emmfa woho nnhuntsa woara wo busuanyi."

column2: "Ɔno na wo kan bɛgyegye dɛ adzekyee
column3: na w'ayarsa efifir ntsɛm: na wo tsenenee bedzi w'enyim; EWURADZE n'enyimnyam bɔbɔ wo nkyidɔm."
na EWURADZE bɛgye do; ebɛtsea mu
column5: Emi nye yi oo. Sɛ iyi kɔndua no

column2: "na sɛ edze dza wo kra no kɔn dɔ ma nyia ɔkɔm dze no
column3: na ma ɔkra a oruhu amandze mee a; nna wo kan bopue wɔ sum mu
column4: na wo kusuww ayɛ dɛ ewiaber ketee:"

column3: na ɔama wo kra amee wɔ mbrɛ hɔ yɛ kwawee
column4: na ɔama wo mbiew ayɛ dzen; na ebɛyɛ dɛ ture a woegugu mu nsu
column5: na dɛ mbasu a no nsu nntwe."

column2: "Na hɔn a wobefi wo mu no bɛkyekyer tsetse ekurofo no: na wɔbɛfrɛ wo Osiw etu
column3: Nyia ɔsesɛw akwan a wɔtsena mu."

column2: "Sɛ iyi w'anan fi ahomgyeda no ho
column3: na annyɛ wo pɛ ho edwuma wɔ me da krɔnkrɔn no mu; na efrɛ ahomgyeda no enyigyedze
column4: na EWURADZE n'akrɔnkrɔndze no dɛ enyimnyamdze; na idzi no nyi
column5: na annyɛ woara wo kwan do adze
column7: na annka woara wo nsɛm a:"

column2: "ɔno na ebɛgye w'enyi wɔ EWURADZE mu; na mama anantsew asaase nsorɔnsorɔmbea do; na mama edzi w'egya Jakob n'egyapadze: na EWURADZE ano na ɔaka."
